overview: A seemingly mild mannered man -- who has just murdered his entire family -- quickly adopts a new identity and leaves town. After building a new relationship with a widow and her teenage daughter, he struggles to hide his true identity and maintain a grip on reality.
tagline: He wanted a perfect family in a perfect town. But they couldn't measure up... Neither could the others...
cast: Terry O'Quinn|Jill Schoelen|Shelley Hack|Charles Lanyer|Stephen Shellen
